remarks: A variant of the Axiom of Union ~ ax-un .  For any set ` x ` , there exists a set ` y ` whose members are exactly the members of the members of ` x ` i.e. the union of ` x ` .  Axiom Union of [BellMachover] p. 466.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2006.)
statement:
axun2 $p |- E. y A. z ( z e. y <-> E. w ( z e. w /\ w e. x ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
